definitions.definition: A water-soluble organic compound , CO(NH 2 ) 2 , formed by the metabolism of proteins and excreted in the urine .
Any N - substituted derivative of urea, with the general formula (R 1 R 2 N)CO(NR 3 R 4 ).

main_definition: ( organic chemistry , biochemistry , uncountable ) A water-soluble organic compound , CO(NH 2 ) 2 , formed by the metabolism of proteins and excreted in the urine .
secondary_definitions: ( organic chemistry , countable ) Any N - substituted derivative of urea, with the general formula (R 1 R 2 N)CO(NR 3 R 4 ).
